definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

pinyin: xue4 se4 su4 chen2 ji1 zheng4

sentences.english: At present, the age of storm deposits reported in China may be traced back to late proterozoic.
sentences.chinese: 目前我國已報導的風暴沉積時代可追溯到晚元古代。

sentences.english: The brine is of the composite formation mechanism of sedimentary transformation and the dissolution and filtration of solid potassium salts.
sentences.chinese: 滷水爲沉積變質水和固態鉀鹽溶濾水的複合成因。

sentences.english: Both the two deposit systems have fine geological conditions with developed reservoir.
sentences.chinese: 兩種沉積體系均有儲層發育的良好地質條件。

sentences.english: These deposits are one of the defining characteristics of Alzheimer's disease.
sentences.chinese: 這些沉積物是阿耳茨海默氏病的特徵之一。

sentences.english: Make sure to stir up all the sedimentation on the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 保證引起在底部的所有沉積作用。

sentences.english: In one embodiment, the disclosure relates to an apparatus for depositing ink on a substrate.
sentences.chinese: 在一個實施例中，本發明涉及在襯底上沉積墨的設備。

sentences.english: Both sedimentology and marine biology are practice-needed curriculum.
sentences.chinese: 沉積學和海洋生物學都是實踐性很強的學科。

sentences.english: Much organically bound carbon is deposited on inland lake bottoms.
sentences.chinese: 大量有機結合碳沉積在內陸湖泊底部。

sentences.english: Faunal assemblage are directly related to the depositional environment.
sentences.chinese: 動物羣落與沉積環境有直接關係。

sentences.english: Yongdeng sag's exploration degree is lower, which is main body of deposition and hydrocarbon source in this area.
sentences.chinese: 永登凹陷勘探程度較低，爲盆地沉積和生烴主體。

sentences.english: Fatty deposits on the liver would point to that, he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，肝部的脂肪沉積會說明一些問題。

sentences.english: The greenschists originated from a series of volcanic - sedimentary formations with intercalated intracontinental tholeiites.
sentences.chinese: 綠片岩原巖是一套含板內拉斑玄武岩的火山沉積建造。

sentences.english: Liver fibrosis is a wound healing process characterized by accumulation of extracellular matrix proteins.
sentences.chinese: 外基質沉積爲特徵的創傷癒合過程。

sentences.english: Exploration degree for Yongdeng sag is lower, which is main body of deposition and hydrocarbon source.
sentences.chinese: 永登凹陷勘探程度較低，爲盆地沉積和生烴主體。

sentences.english: With an eye out for lake deposits, I went back to get samples a few days later.
sentences.chinese: 惦記着湖泊沉積，幾天後我又回去取了樣本。

sentences.english: The process is fast in deposition speed and excellent in corrosion resistance of the coating.
sentences.chinese: 該工藝沉積速率快，鍍層耐蝕性優異。

definition: inner product/the dot product of two vectors
the body/organism (usually human)/(fig.) fabric (of society etc)/cohesive structure (of an entity)

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: to stock up/to lay in supplies/to hoard (for speculation)/to corner the market in sth
